synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involved mixing lithium sulfide (Li2S) and phosphorus pentasulfide (P2S5) in a 1L reaction vessel under a nitrogen atmosphere, adding tetrahydrofuran (THF) after cooling, stirring for 72 hours at room temperature, filtering the reaction mixture, and drying the obtained solid content at 90Â°C to yield 38g of Li3PS4 as a white powder.
